attributes.action: To make Vets bills exempt from VAT
attributes.additional_details: The average cost of going to the Vets £100 which means each time I take my pet I have to pay the Government £20 for the privilege to of looking after my pet and with today high living costs this only adds to the maintaining the cost living
attributes.background: To make VAT exempt from Vets bills

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731567
